title: Montana Silversmiths Women's Opal Ribbons Teardrop Necklace Silver One Size
description: Womens Montana Silversmiths Necklace: Ladies Montana Silversmiths Western Necklace. Opal stones and antiqued silver toned rope play off each other in this teardrop-shaped, captivating women's Opal Ribbons Teardrop necklace. A center large clear cubic zirconia teardrop shaped stone dangles in the center framed in smooth silver. Don't be fooled by the shape because this teardrop necklace is the perfect way to add a little sunshine to a rainy day. Necklace pendant hangs on a 19 inch chain. Rhodium over a brass base. Synthetic opal. You can maintain your silver brilliance with an occasional wipe of a damp cloth. DO NOT use chemical or abrasive cleaners. NC4610
